channel.title: cli-hacks on Aswin's Site

item.title: How I navigate directories?
item.description: I do not use any autojump tools to navigate across my project directories. A simple bash function does the job for me. Customization is the main reason. The tools I use to create the functions can be replaced with GNU tools. I use them because they are fast and have some additional features like respect .gitignore file. Let’s create the function. Steps 1. Find directories or files to navigate to I need a way to list all the directories I am interested in.
